definitions.definition: The condition of a martyr; the death or suffering of a martyr; the death or suffering on account of adherence to the Christian faith, or to any cause.
Extreme suffering , affliction ; torment ; torture , especially without reason.

main_definition: The condition of a martyr; the death or suffering of a martyr; the death or suffering on account of adherence to the Christian faith, or to any cause.
secondary_definitions: Extreme suffering , affliction ; torment ; torture , especially without reason.
